public class Bot extends Player
Class representing a Bot player in the maze game.

    • pullLever

      public boolean pullLever(Game game, Room roomToUnlock, int correctLeverId)
      Simulates the bot pulling a lever in a lever challenge.
      Parameters:
      game - the current game instance
      roomToUnlock - the room associated with the lever challenge
      correctLeverId - the ID of the correct lever to pull
      Returns:
      true if the bot pulled the correct lever, false otherwise
